channel.title: Runescape to Modern Warfare 2!
channel.description:
Download Links: Soruce: * Client: * THe base i started with this is Winterlove soruce but it is basically from scratch. Welcome to Runescape to Mw2. - This is NOT the servers real name btw
I started this project on the 19th February, which is my birthday .
I am doing this entirely because I find it fun to hack up the Runescape client and change everything around.
The point of this project is merely to see what the Runescape engine is actually capable of, and what can be done with it.
I have full belief in myself that I will complete this project. I am a very dedicated person and rarely abandon things. If you look at any previous project I have had on google, it has ALWAYS made it to the advertise section.
When this is finished, I don't really expect many rsps players to play it, but im sure that there will be a huge amount of gamers out there who would love to play it right from their browser.
Why don't I just make my own first person shooter from scratch? Even if I had the knowledge to write my own 3d software engine/game/server from scratch, I certainly wouldn't have the time to do it, and it would never be as decent as Jagex's. (I think people under-estimate how good Jagex's software renderer is *obviously not in terms of graphics*.)
One day I will definitely create my own game from scratch. But for now I am only a 15 year old with still a lot to learn.
Features
Green = Complete Orange = Under development Red = Not yet started
Progress - Most must be green before beta (please suggest)
* Game Engine o Skybox system implementation o Ability to look all of the way up to the sky with no restrictions o Player animations can leave the floor tile without ANY rendering issues * Movement o Free movement (No tile restrictions) o W,A,S,D movement. o Instant respond time (instantly starts walking after pressing button without delay) o Walking animation implemented for first person view o Walking animation implemented for 3rd person view o Running animation implemented for first person view o Running animation implemented for 3rd person view o Walking and Running support - Holding middle mouse scroll to run. o walking/running effects your movement speed for other players * Shooting o Basic muzzle flash when trigger pulled for first person view o Basic 3d muzzle flash when trigger pulled for 3rd person view o Hit marker appears when bullet hits target, and then fades out o Cross hairs expand while the gun is being fired o Cross hairs are not visible when the weapon is aimed o Shoot animation implemented for first person view o Shoot animation implemented for 3rd person view o Health removed from the target, based on distance and which part of the body was hit o Aiming o Red flashing on targets screen while being shot o Shooting sound effect implemented for the one shooting o Global sound effect implemented for people around * Weapon Reloading o Detailed reload animation implemented for first person view o Extremely basic reload animation implemented for 3rd person view o Reload sound effect(s) perfectly timed with animation frames for first person o Automatically starts reloading if the weapon is out of ammo and trigger is being pulled o Can't shoot until the reload animation has completed. * A basic map for matches Now for some pictures:
[IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/2428061/whay321.png[/img]
[IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/2428061/killstreakrewards.png[/img]
[IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/2428061/snipe/1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/2428061/snipe/2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/2428061/portsarim.png[/img]
[IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/2428061/hitmarker.png[/img]
[IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/2428061/crosshairs.png[/img]
[IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/2428061/multiplayerpixels.png[/img]
[IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/2428061/height/2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/2428061/lobby.png[/img]

item.title: Runescape to Modern Warfare 2!
item.dc:creator: @elementalscape elementalscape
item.description:
@elementalscape wrote:

Download Links:
Soruce: *
Client: *
THe base i started with this is Winterlove soruce but it is basically from scratch.
Welcome to Runescape to Mw2. - This is NOT the servers real name btw

I started this project on the 19th February, which is my birthday .

I am doing this entirely because I find it fun to hack up the Runescape client and change everything around.

The point of this project is merely to see what the Runescape engine is actually capable of, and what can be done with it.

I have full belief in myself that I will complete this project. I am a very dedicated person and rarely abandon things. If you look at any previous project I have had on google, it has ALWAYS made it to the advertise section.

When this is finished, I don’t really expect many rsps players to play it, but im sure that there will be a huge amount of gamers out there who would love to play it right from their browser.

Why don’t I just make my own first person shooter from scratch?
Even if I had the knowledge to write my own 3d software engine/game/server from scratch, I certainly wouldn’t have the time to do it, and it would never be as decent as Jagex’s. (I think people under-estimate how good Jagex’s software renderer is obviously not in terms of graphics.)

One day I will definitely create my own game from scratch. But for now I am only a 15 year old with still a lot to learn.

Features

Green = Complete
Orange = Under development
Red = Not yet started

Progress - Most must be green before beta (please suggest)

* Game Engine
      o Skybox system implementation
      o Ability to look all of the way up to the sky with no restrictions
      o Player animations can leave the floor tile without ANY rendering issues
* Movement
      o Free movement (No tile restrictions)
      o W,A,S,D movement.
      o Instant respond time (instantly starts walking after pressing button without delay)
      o Walking animation implemented for first person view
      o Walking animation implemented for 3rd person view
      o Running animation implemented for first person view
      o Running animation implemented for 3rd person view
      o Walking and Running support - Holding middle mouse scroll to run.
      o walking/running effects your movement speed for other players
* Shooting
      o Basic muzzle flash when trigger pulled for first person view
      o Basic 3d muzzle flash when trigger pulled for 3rd person view
      o Hit marker appears when bullet hits target, and then fades out
      o Cross hairs expand while the gun is being fired
      o Cross hairs are not visible when the weapon is aimed
      o Shoot animation implemented for first person view
      o Shoot animation implemented for 3rd person view
      o Health removed from the target, based on distance and which part of the body was hit
      o Aiming
      o Red flashing on targets screen while being shot
      o Shooting sound effect implemented for the one shooting
      o Global sound effect implemented for people around
* Weapon Reloading
      o Detailed reload animation implemented for first person view
      o Extremely basic reload animation implemented for 3rd person view
      o Reload sound effect(s) perfectly timed with animation frames for first person
      o Automatically starts reloading if the weapon is out of ammo and trigger is being pulled
      o Can't shoot until the reload animation has completed.
* A basic map for matches

Now for some pictures:

Read full topic
